sys_atf_test.description:
This test should fail with a message indicating that NeedIt requests cannot be created for today. Note that the value applied to the When needed field is time zone dependent (hoursAgoEnd(4) is for EDT).
Test generated from template. To complete this test do the following: 1. Pick a correct user to impersonate, a user with the right roles. 2. Opens a new form for a table. 3. Edit the Set Field Values step to supply values for all fields that need them. 4. Edit the mandatory, non mandatory, read only, non read only, visible and non visible fields. 5. Submits the current form.
sys_atf_test.name: When needed - Today
